ygData.subject: Re: Armor look
ygData.msgSnippet: quick FYI: I spend hours in Upper Guk over the weekend trying to get this woven armor (I may not be fighting the right stuff).  I finally got a pair of
ygData.messageBody:
quick FYI:

I spend hours in Upper Guk over the weekend trying to get this woven armor (I may not be fighting the
right stuff). I finally got a pair of sleeves. The sleeves did not show up on my character if I took
my robe off. I am going to stay down there for a while (GREAT exp!) and see if I can get a full set.
It doesn't look like it's going to show up, but it's decent armor anyways.

Ezrae
16th Level DE Enchantress
Brell Serilis


Janea 'Jake' Knight wrote:

> From: "Janea 'Jake' Knight" <Janea@...>
>
> Are we talking CHEST items here? If so, I am THERE baby....
> I have lots of leather and plate look stuff but if I take my robe off I've still got that mini dark
> elf red bikini top... grrrr
>
> >>>>
> Any armor equipable by your true race will show up on another race you have
> taken the form of. Only problem is that you are a caster, and cant wear
> much other than cloth or magical armor. Only think I can think of that will
> give you a nice armored look is Woven armor, and the ribcage armor from the
> Goblin Alchemist in Misty Thicket. Both appear as leather on your character.
>
